title: Sen. Klobuchar Says Congress Is Losing Patience With Tech Giants
description:
After a whistleblower shared internal Facebook documents, lawmakers renewed calls to regulate social media companies. But concerns over the influence tech giants exert on society extend far beyond Facebook. We spoke with Sen. Amy Klobuchar about how she hopes to rein in tech companies.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
